titles.title: Charitable Giving Act of 2000
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow all taxpayers a credit against income tax for up to $200 of charitable contributions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/21/2000--Introduced. Charitable Giving Act of 2000 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to establish, for all taxpayers, a charitable contribution tax credit of up to $200. States that such credit shall be in lieu of any deduction otherwise allowed for such contribution.
